frontmatter.title: Don’t have 10,000 hours to learn something new?
frontmatter.short: Competence takes 20 hours. And knowing that little nugget makes it much more realizable.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
frontmatter.hero_alt: Don’t have 10,000 hours to learn something new?

mdx.excerpt: 10,000 hours is to become world class, ie gold medal Olympian. 10,000 hours is five years at a full time job. No doubt on pursuing…
